title: When is Nexus blitz v.2 coming out OCE time
body: Just wondering if anyone knows i really want to get into it

replies.body:
Best bet is that Nexus Blitz will become available over the next few days, before the weekend.

Admittedly, the news article about it seems a bit misleading, since it doesn't state a "start time" and just says "[Nexus Blitz returns until 22nd January](https://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/special-event/nexus-blitz-neeko-snowdown-and-all-star)", which makes it seem like it should already be available.
